inputs:
The essence of the task: Given a metaphoric sentence, identify if the second sentence is the correct paraphrase of the first.
Q: Katie’s plan to get into college was a house of cards on a crooked table <-->  Katie’s college was a house of cards on a crooked table
  choice: True
  choice: False
A:
